sourcesContent:
import { Line, CartesianGrid, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, BarChart, Bar } from "recharts"; import { useChartData } from "../../Hook/useChartData"; import { CustomTooltip } from "../../utils/CustomTooltip.js"; // Water Chart function WaterChart({ days = 7 }) { const { data, todayTotal, avg } = useChartData("water", "water", days); return (

Water Intake

Today: {todayTotal} glasses
Avg ({days}d): {avg} glasses
}/> 8} stroke="#1d4ed8" strokeWidth={2} dot={false} />
); } // Calories Chart function CaloriesChart({ days = 7 }) { const { data, todayTotal, avg } = useChartData("calories", "calories", days); return (

Calories Burned

Today: {todayTotal} kcal
Avg ({days}d): {avg} calories
}/>
); } // Steps Chart function StepsChart({ days = 7 }) { const { data, todayTotal, avg } = useChartData("steps", "steps", days); return (

Steps

Today: {todayTotal} steps
Avg ({days}d): {avg} steps
}/> 12000} stroke="#047857" strokeWidth={2} dot={false} />
); } // Sleep Chart function SleepChart({ days = 7 }) { const { data, todayTotal, avg } = useChartData("sleep", "sleep", days); return (

Sleep

Today: {todayTotal} hours
Avg ({days}d): {avg} hours
}/> 8} stroke="#7c3aed" strokeWidth={2} dot={false} />
); } function DistanceChart({ days = 7 }) { const { data, todayTotal, avg } = useChartData("distance", "distance", days); return (

Distance

Today: {todayTotal} km
Avg ({days}d): {avg} km
} /> 5} stroke="#047857" strokeWidth={2} dot={false} />
); } export { WaterChart, CaloriesChart, StepsChart, SleepChart,DistanceChart };
